pages.title: Pyron
pages.text: $(li)The Pyron Crossbow inflicts a little more damage than the $(l:patchouli:weapons/end_crystal_crossbow)End Crystal Crossbow$(/l).$(br)$(li)When an arrow fired by this weapon hits the ground, fireballs will appear hitting nearby creatures.

pages.name: Pyron
pages.text: This weapon doesn't have durability and can't be burned by lava or fire.
